name: Customer_GetSpecificCustomerClassBycustomerClassId
description: Get a specific customer class - ScreenId=AR201000

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$ul: **description**: The top part > Description > A detailed description of the customer class.
**id**: The top part > Class ID	> The unique identifier of the class. You can use an alphanumeric string of up to 10 characters.
**paymentMethodId**: The General information tab > Payment method > The payment method used by default in relations with these customers.
**requiredTaxzoneId**: The General information tab > Require VAT zone > A check box that means (if selected) that the VAT zone value is required for customers of the class.
**taxZoneId**: The General information tab > VAT zone ID >	The default VAT zone for customers of the class.
